meanings.definition: A short, high-pitched sound typically made by electronic devices.
meanings.sent1: The beeps from the microwave signaled that the food was ready.
meanings.sent2: I heard beeps coming from the computer when it started up.
meanings.sent3: The beeps from the alarm clock woke me up in the morning.
meanings.sent4: The beeps of the car horn startled the pedestrians.
meanings.sent5: The beeps of the smoke detector warned us of a fire.

meanings.definition: To emit a short, high-pitched sound.
meanings.sent1: The machine beeps when it finishes the cycle.
meanings.sent2: She beeps the car horn to get the attention of the driver ahead.
meanings.sent3: The bird beeps happily in the tree outside my window.
meanings.sent4: The watch beeps every hour to remind me of the time.
meanings.sent5: The phone beeps to notify me of a new message.

meanings.definition: The act of emitting a short, high-pitched sound.
meanings.sent1: The constant beeps of the hospital machines filled the room.
meanings.sent2: His beeps during the game annoyed the other players.
meanings.sent3: The beeps of the toy robot entertained the children for hours.
meanings.sent4: The beeps of the backing truck guided the driver safely.
meanings.sent5: The beeps of the heart monitor reassured the patient's family.
